task.title: How do I invite others to an existing screen share session?
task.shortdesc: Sometimes, after you start an Instant Share session with one or more participants, you might want more participants to join the session. To do so, you must stop the current Instant Share session and start a new one with all participants.

step.cmd: First, end the Instant Share session. During your existing Instant Share session, click Stop Sharing in the floating palette window.
Select the contacts with whom you want to participate in an Instant Share session.

entry.p: Click the names of all online contacts whom you want to participate in the new Instant Share session. Or in the chat window, invite all the participants.

Click Sametime Contacts icon Sametime Contacts to open the Contacts panel in the Notes sidebar. Then, click the names of all the online contacts whom you want to participate in the new Instant Share session. Or in the chat window, invite all the participants.

step.cmd: Click in the chat window or click Click for a menu of Options for a menu of options from the contact list action bar. Then, click Instant Share and select which part of your screen you want to share (Share an application, Share My Entire Screen, and Share a Region).
step.stepresult: The people that you selected in step 2 receive an invitation to join the Instant Share session.All screen share participants must be from the same server community and use a Sametime Connect client that supports Instant Share. In addition, contacts must not have an availability status of Do Not Disturb to participate in an Instant Share session.
